<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<rss version="2.0"><channel><title>xkcd.com</title><link>https://xkcd.com/</link><description>xkcd.com: A webcomic of romance and math humor.</description><language>en</language><item><title>Messaging Systems</title><link>https://xkcd.com/2365/</link><description><img src="https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/messaging_systems.png" title="SMS is just the worst, but I'm having trouble convincing people to adopt my preferred system, TLS IRC with a local server and a patched DOSBox gateway running in my mobile browser." alt="SMS is just the worst, but I'm having trouble convincing people to adopt my preferred system, TLS IRC with a local server and a patched DOSBox gateway running in my mobile browser." /></description><pubDate>Mon, 28 Sep 2020 04:00:00 -0000</pubDate><guid>https://xkcd.com/2365/</guid></item><item><title>Parity Conservation</title><link>https://xkcd.com/2364/</link><description><img src="https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/parity_conservation.png" title="Bloody Mary is made of antimatter. It explains so much." alt="Bloody Mary is made of antimatter. It explains so much." /></description><pubDate>Fri, 25 Sep 2020 04:00:00 -0000</pubDate><guid>https://xkcd.com/2364/</guid></item><item><title>Message Boards</title><link>https://xkcd.com/2363/</link><description><img src="https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/message_boards.png" title="(c) You can have a scooter when you pay for it yourself, and (d) if you can't learn to start a new thread rather than responding to an old one, you'll be banned. [thread locked by moderator]" alt="(c) You can have a scooter when you pay for it yourself, and (d) if you can't learn to start a new thread rather than responding to an old one, you'll be banned. [thread locked by moderator]" /></description><pubDate>Wed, 23 Sep 2020 04:00:00 -0000</pubDate><guid>https://xkcd.com/2363/</guid></item><item><title>Volcano Dinosaur</title><link>https://xkcd.com/2362/</link><description><img src="https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/volcano_dinosaur.png" title="Phylogeneticists are working on identifying and notifying its next of kin." alt="Phylogeneticists are working on identifying and notifying its next of kin." /></description><pubDate>Mon, 21 Sep 2020 04:00:00 -0000</pubDate><guid>https://xkcd.com/2362/</guid></item></channel></rss>
